CustomField.description: What is the api name of the field you want to set on the new record based on the returned value? If you are trying to find the account id based on the bis id, select Id from Account where BIS_Id__c=100, and this is for a contact, AccountId would be the value in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: What is the api name of the field you want to set on the new record based on the returned value?
CustomField.label: New Object Related Field
